title: Classes for kcet seconded extended round
content:
I know that I will be missing classes and the admission center at pes told me that you might or might not have backup classes and you need to confirm it with the department professors.
If we don't have backup classes, how do I cover up all the syllabus considering that I am an average student?

comments.body:
Trust me, you can score in any subject without any faculties help. 

There wont be any backup classes , but they will keep a longer schedule like 8am till 5pm or 6pm on all days of the week
I joined in 2nd extended round and my first day of college was in January. We had extended classes, it was a bit hectic but definitely manageable.
